input: Get me the IDs of the bank customer lock requests that have an event code of '103000' and are linked to bank accounts with a specific currency code.

output.sql: SELECT BankCustomerLockRequest.ID FROM BankCustomerLockRequest JOIN BankAccountContract ON BankCustomerLockRequest.BankAccountContracts = BankAccountContract.UUID WHERE BankAccountContract.CurrencyCode = 'EUR' AND BankCustomerLockRequest.EventCode = '103000';
